operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO messages (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, random_id, message, date, created_at) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :random_id, :message, :date, :created_at)

operation.name: SelectByIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_id, peer_type, peer_id, random_id, message, date FROM messages WHERE id IN (:idList)

operation.name: SelectByUserIdAndPeer
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_id, peer_type, peer_id, random_id, message, date FROM messages WHERE peer_type = :peer_type AND (user_id = :user_id AND peer_id = :peer_id) OR (user_id = :peer_id AND peer_id = :user_id)
